description.last_approved_text: China has reaped the benefits of bureacracy for centuries, but a seed of chaos has taken root within the court.

pooled_resources.description: China has reaped the benefits of bureacracy for centuries, but a seed of chaos has taken root within the court.
{{tr:3k_main_displaced_population_description}}

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: China is its people, and you are the steward to many.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: China is its people, and you are the steward to many.

description.last_approved_text: A strong emperor is a strong empire, but the warlords and governors within the Han may not appreciate you centralising power.

pooled_resources.description: A strong emperor is a strong empire, but the warlords and governors within the Han may not appreciate you centralising power.

description.last_approved_text: {{tr:dlc04_term_fervour}} is the amount of impassioned support you have amongst your followers. Keep this flame burning strong, honing it into a spear to pierce your enemies.

pooled_resources.description: {{tr:dlc04_term_fervour}} is the amount of impassioned support you have amongst your followers. Keep this flame burning strong, honing it into a spear to pierce your enemies.

description.last_approved_text: {{tr:dlc04_term_regional_fervour}} is the amount the population of this area believe in the Yellow Turban cause. Learn to harness it, then wield it as you would a blade.

pooled_resources.description: {{tr:dlc04_term_regional_fervour}} is the amount the population of this area believe in the Yellow Turban cause. Learn to harness it, then wield it as you would a blade.

description.last_approved_text: With bravery and discipline, Liu Chong inspires his men and puts fear into the enemies of the imperial palace.

pooled_resources.description: With bravery and discipline, Liu Chong inspires his men and puts fear into the enemies of the imperial palace.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: The fortitude of Liu Chong rewards those with brave hearts and honest intentions.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: The fortitude of Liu Chong rewards those with brave hearts and honest intentions.

description.last_approved_text: One's domain cannot outreach one's governance, lest order succumb to chaos.

pooled_resources.description: One's domain cannot outreach one's governance, lest order succumb to chaos.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: A domain to match one's lawful governance; a realm to match one's right to rule.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: A domain to match one's lawful governance; a realm to match one's right to rule.

description.last_approved_text: To govern is to be subject to the laws of the Han – without their approval any expansion will be treated as an affront against the empire itself!

pooled_resources.description: To govern is to be subject to the laws of the Han – without their approval any expansion will be treated as an affront against the empire itself!

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Governance brings the weight of the Han government behind it.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Governance brings the weight of the Han government behind it.

description.last_approved_text: Favours, information, money, respect: all are commodities when it comes to politics. Use these resources sparingly to bend others to your will.

pooled_resources.description: Favours, information, money, respect; all are commodities when it comes to politics. Use these resources sparingly to bend others to your will.
pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: HIDDEN

description.last_approved_text: Empowering the warlords and governors will strengthen the Han Empire against external threats. However, it may also risk developing new threats from within...

pooled_resources.description: Empowering the warlords and governors will strengthen the Han Empire against external threats. However, it may also risk developing new threats from within...

description.last_approved_text: Momentum is gained by defeating enemy characters and armies with your faction leader's army. The more of it you have, the faster it decays.

pooled_resources.description: Momentum is gained by defeating enemy characters and armies with your faction leader's army. The more of it you have, the faster it decays.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: For every enemy defeated, the flame of Lü Bu's rage grows and grows until it swallows the world whole.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: For every enemy defeated, the flame of Lü Bu's rage grows and grows until it swallows the world whole.

description.last_approved_text: For each character defeated by your faction leader's army, your strength increases – but so does the envy and suspicion of others.

pooled_resources.description: For each character defeated by your faction leader's army, your strength increases – but so does the envy and suspicion of others.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Personal Victories

description.last_approved_text: Fame and fortune represent recognition of your services on the battlefield as a mercenary. Should you fail in your commitments, your contract will be void.

pooled_resources.description: Fame and fortune represent recognition of your services on the battlefield as a mercenary. Should you fail in your commitments, your contract will be void.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: A mercenary lives and dies by their reputation. Nurture it, and grow it, and the coin will surely flow.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: A mercenary lives and dies by their reputation. Nurture it, and grow it, and the coin will surely flow.

description.last_approved_text: The flame that burns twice as bright burns half as long.

pooled_resources.description: The flame that burns twice as bright burns half as long.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Reckless luck represents Sun Ce's brilliance and reckless nature, that risks eventually catching up with him

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Reckless luck represents Sun Ce's brilliance and reckless nature, that risks eventually catching up with him

description.last_approved_text: Experience and knowledge are like torches in the night; by placing them together a great bonfire can be made, enlightening us all.

pooled_resources.description: Experience and knowledge are like torches in the night; by placing them together a great bonfire can be made, enlightening us all.

description.last_approved_text: White Tiger Yan understands that by standing side-by-side, the disenfranchised and the downtrodden can overcome even the greatest of adversity.

pooled_resources.description: White Tiger Yan understands that by standing side-by-side, the disenfranchised and the downtrodden can overcome even the greatest of adversity.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: It represents the size and quality of Yan Baihu's cross-faction collaboration efforts

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: It represents the size and quality of Yan Baihu's cross-faction collaboration efforts

pooled_resources.description: NO DESC

description.last_approved_text: The longer that Wild Fire remains confined, the greater the strain will be man and god alike.

pooled_resources.description: The longer that Wild Fire remains confined, the greater the strain will be man and god alike.

description.last_approved_text: Zhurong's fury is the inferno given human form – born of deific power, she sets ablaze all before her in an unending conflagration!

pooled_resources.description: Zhurong's fury is the inferno given human form - born of deific power, she sets ablaze all before her in an unending conflagration!

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Wild Fire is the inferno given human form – in Zhurong.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Wild Fire is the inferno given human form – in Zhurong.

description.last_approved_text: The pride of your faction is increasing with every defeated enemy.

pooled_resources.description: The pride of your faction is increasing with every defeated enemy.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: The pride of this tribe is only matched by their virtue on the battlefield.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: The pride of this tribe is only matched by their virtue on the battlefield.

pooled_resources.description: HIDDEN

description.last_approved_text: Domination provides increasing bonuses for each Nanman tribe confederated.

pooled_resources.description: Domination provides increasing bonuses for each Nanman tribe confederated.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Conquest is the mark of a great commander, but possibly also a tyrant.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Conquest is the mark of a great commander, but possibly also a tyrant.

description.last_approved_text: Co-operation provides increasing bonuses for each Nanman tribe you vassalise.

pooled_resources.description: Co-operation provides increasing bonuses for each Nanman tribe you vassalise.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: A popular leader is a dangerous one. Beware the one who unifies many under one banner.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: A popular leader is a dangerous one. Beware the one who unifies many under one banner.

description.last_approved_text: Wild Fire is burning, giving Zhurong and her forces untold power. Yet it cannot burn indefinitely, and the more time progresses, the more it will strain the armies, and Zhurong.

pooled_resources.description: Wild Fire is burning, giving Zhurong and her forces untold power. Yet it cannot burn indefinitely, and the more time progresses, the more it will strain the armies, and Zhurong.

description.last_approved_text: Splendour represents the growing commercial, cultural, and scholarly power of the Shi South.

pooled_resources.description: Splendour represents the growing commercial, cultural, and scholarly power of the Shi South.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Splendour represents the growing commercial, cultural, and scholarly power of the Shi south.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Splendour represents the growing commercial, cultural, and scholarly power of the Shi south.

description.last_approved_text: Aspiration represents this faction's willingness to do whatever it takes to succeed. It can be used to enable a variety of faction bonuses.

pooled_resources.description: Aspiration represents this faction's willingness to do whatever it takes to succeed. It can be used to enable a variety of faction bonuses.

description.last_approved_text: The favour of the imperial court can be a blessing to the emperor's friend, but a curse to his enemies.

pooled_resources.description: The favour of the imperial court can be a blessing to the emperor's friend, but a curse to his enemies.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: The favour of the emperor leads to strong diplomatic influence.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: The favour of the emperor leads to strong diplomatic influence.

pooled_resources.description: HIDDEN

description.last_approved_text: Credibility represents the diplomatic respect and influence of this faction. It can be used to manipulate and influence others in diplomacy.

pooled_resources.description: Credibility represents the diplomatic respect and influence of this faction. It can be used to manipulate and influence others in diplomacy.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: This faction's credibility determines its diplomatic influence.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: This faction's credibility determines its diplomatic influence.

description.last_approved_text: Food is a key resource generated by specific buildings, such as farms and fisheries; it can also be obtained through diplomatic trading. Food shortage across your territories will lead to local reserves being depleted. This will reduce military supply recovery for your armies and can cause {{tr:food_tooltip_public_order}} issues.

pooled_resources.description: Food is a key resource generated by specific buildings, such as farms and fisheries; it can also be obtained through diplomatic trading. Food shortage across your territories will lead to local reserves being depleted. This will reduce military supply recovery for your armies and can cause {{tr:food_tooltip_public_order}} issues.

description.last_approved_text: The display of heroic leadership will inspire troops and people alike, yielding a great fortune for your realm.

pooled_resources.description: The display of heroic leadership will inspire troops and people alike, yielding a great fortune for your realm.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Heroic leadership inspires great deeds from the people.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Heroic leadership inspires great deeds from the people.

description.last_approved_text: Infamy instils respect in your enemies and measures the success of your exploits.

pooled_resources.description: Infamy instils respect in your enemies and measures the success of your exploits.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Infamy creates respect; an able measure of one's exploits!

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Infamy creates respect; an able measure of one's exploits!

description.last_approved_text: Imperial authority is displayed through acts of domination, power and brutality.

pooled_resources.description: Imperial authority is displayed through acts of domination, power and brutality.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Intimidating acts of domination and power instill fear, and begrudging respect.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Intimidating acts of domination and power instill fear, and begrudging respect.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Wealth is power.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Wealth is power.

description.last_approved_text: Those who believe themselves the legitimate rulers of China must still prove themselves to others – this is the measure of success for achieving legitimacy.

pooled_resources.description: Those who believe themselves the legitimate rulers of China must still prove themselves to others – this is the measure of success for achieving legitimacy.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Legitimacy proves worthiness to others; the right to rule!

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Legitimacy proves worthiness to others; the right to rule!

description.last_approved_text: The illustrious lineage of the Yuan family can open doors and create opportunities. For the common soldier, the lineage of Yuan Shao and his descendants is a flame of inspiration; a flame that demands to be fuelled with courage and prestige.

pooled_resources.description: The illustrious lineage of the Yuan family can open doors and create opportunities. For the common soldier, the lineage of Yuan Shao and his descendants is a flame of inspiration; a flame that demands to be fuelled with courage and prestige.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: A respected name, tied to respected lineage, can provide opportunities many others would not be afforded.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: A respected name, tied to respected lineage, can provide opportunities many others would not be afforded.

description.last_approved_text: Your population are the people living in your settlements and surrounding countryside. High population will increase peasantry income and army replenishment.

pooled_resources.description: Your population are the people living in your settlements and surrounding countryside. High population will increase peasantry income and army replenishment.

description.last_approved_text: Ensure the satisfaction of your subjects and you ensure a clearer path to victory.

pooled_resources.description: Ensure the satisfaction of your subjects, and you ensure a clearer path to victory.

description.last_approved_text: Reserves can be stored to support settlements in dire times of food shortages, to re-supply local armies, or to increase hold-out time of {{tr:map_province}} capitals during a siege.

pooled_resources.description: Reserves can be stored to support settlements in dire times of food shortages, to re-supply local armies, or to increase hold-out time of {{tr:map_province}} capitals during a siege.

description.last_approved_text: Cohesion and unity are the seeds from which a new dynasty will grow. A new age of hope will not be built on the fragile foundation of a divided realm.

pooled_resources.description: Cohesion and unity are the seeds from which a new dynasty will grow. A new age of hope will not be built on the fragile foundation of a divided realm.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Unity is a leader's strength to pull people together and keep them together, to better seize their ideals.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Unity is a leader's strength to pull people together and keep them together, to better seize their ideals.

pooled_resources.description: PH
PH
PH

description.last_approved_text: Influence represents how much authority and control this faction leader has within his own government and within the administration of his faction.

pooled_resources.description: Influence represents how much authority and control this faction leader has within his own government and within the administration of his faction.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Influence represents the amount of authority and control this faction leader has within his own government and within the administration of his faction.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Influence represents the amount of authority and control this faction leader has within his own government and within the administration of his faction.

pooled_resources.description: PH

description.last_approved_text: Turbulent times call for radical measures, a reformation of the old ways to lead the people into a brighter future.

pooled_resources.description: Turbulent times call for radical measures, a reformation of the old ways to lead the people into a brighter future.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Reformation of ideals is the first step towards true societal progression.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Reformation of ideals is the first step towards true societal progression.

description.last_approved_text: Absolute control is the hand that keeps the wheels of government turning, and the ambitions of lesser people in check!

pooled_resources.description: Absolute control is the hand that keeps the wheels of government turning, and the ambitions of lesser people in check!

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Maintain control and you avert the chaos that others trail in their wake!

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Maintain control and you avert the chaos that others trail in their wake!

description.last_approved_text: One's domain cannot outreach one's jurisdiction, lest order succumb to chaos.

pooled_resources.description: One's domain cannot outreach one's jurisdiction, lest order succumb to chaos.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: A domain to match one's lawful jursidiction; a princedom to match one's right to rule.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: A domain to match one's lawful jursidiction; a princedom to match one's right to rule.

description.last_approved_text: Sima Liang's claim to the regency has been usurped by his ambitious kin – only by re-establishing his lawful jurisdiction over the people can he hope to restore order to the Jin Empire!

pooled_resources.description: Sima Liang's claim to the regency has been usurped by his ambitious kin – only by re-establishing his lawful jurisdiction over the people can he hope to restore order to the Jin Empire!

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Much can be said for jurisdiction earned through just and honourable means.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Much can be said for jurisdiction earned through just and honourable means.

description.last_approved_text: Subterfuge is the secret weapon to which all will succumb, should Sima Lun have his way.

pooled_resources.description: Subterfuge is the secret weapon to which all will succumb, should Sima Lun have his way.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: To achieve one's ends, it is sometimes necessary to engage in acts of subterfuge.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: To achieve one's ends, it is sometimes necessary to engage in acts of subterfuge.

description.last_approved_text: Fury represents the enthusiasm of this faction and the magnitude of its drive forward to conquest and glory.

pooled_resources.description: Fury represents the enthusiasm of this faction and the magnitude of its drive forward to conquest and glory.

foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip.last_approved_text: Fury represents the enthusiasm of this faction and the magnitude of its drive forward to conquest and glory.

pooled_resources.foreign_diplomacy_view_tooltip: Fury represents the enthusiasm of this faction and the magnitude of its drive forward to conquest and glory.
